players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I investigated Alice and discovered she is the mafioso. We should vote for her."
You: "I can't believe Charlie is accusing me out of nowhere! Maybe he's the real mafioso trying to shift blame. We should question him first."
Bob: "Charlie’s quick accusation could be true, but it’s also suspicious how he immediately pointed at Alice. We should consider both possibilities carefully before voting."
You: "Charlie, if you're really the detective, why accuse me so quickly without more proof? It makes you look suspicious too."
